scale.presetsDescription: Quick scale options for common preferences

logOrder.label: Log Order

general.agentFrameworkDescription: The coding framework used for autonomous tasks
general.aiTerminalNamingDescription: Automatically name terminals based on commands (uses Haiku)
general.featureModelSettingsDescription: Model and thinking level for Insights, Ideation, and Roadmap
general.pythonPathDescription: Path to Python executable (leave empty for auto-detection)
general.gitPathDescription: Path to Git executable (leave empty for auto-detection)
general.githubCLIPathDescription: Path to GitHub CLI (gh) executable (leave empty for auto-detection)
general.gitlabCLIPathDescription: Path to GitLab CLI (glab) executable (leave empty for auto-detection)
general.claudePathDescription: Path to Claude CLI executable (leave empty for auto-detection)
general.autoClaudePathDescription: Relative path to auto-claude directory in projects
general.autoNameTerminalsDescription: Use AI to generate descriptive names for terminal tabs based on their activity

theme.title: Appearance
theme.modeDescription: Choose between light and dark themes

devtools.description: Configure your preferred IDE, terminal, and terminal font settings

ide.label: Preferred IDE
ide.description: Auto Claude will open worktrees in this editor

terminal.label: Preferred Terminal
terminal.description: Auto Claude will open terminal sessions here

devtools.noToolsDetected: No additional tools detected (VS Code and system terminal will be used)

autoNameClaude.label: Auto-name Claude terminals
autoNameClaude.description: Use AI to generate a descriptive name for Claude terminals based on your first message

yoloMode.label: YOLO Mode
yoloMode.description: Start Claude with --dangerously-skip-permissions flag, bypassing all safety prompts. Use with extreme caution.
yoloMode.warning: This mode bypasses Claude's permission system. Only enable if you fully trust the code being executed.

updates.title: Updates
updates.updateDownloaded: Update downloaded! Click Install to restart and apply the update.
updates.autoUpdateProjectsDescription: Automatically update Auto Claude in projects when a new version is available
updates.betaUpdatesDescription: Receive pre-release beta versions with new features (may be less stable)
updates.stableDowngradeDescription: You're currently on a beta version. Since you've disabled beta updates, you can switch to the latest stable release.
updates.readOnlyVolumeDescription: Auto Claude is running from a read-only disk image (DMG). Please drag the app to your Applications folder and relaunch it from there to install updates.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.onTaskCompleteDescription: Notify when a task finishes successfully
notifications.onTaskFailedDescription: Notify when a task encounters an error
notifications.onReviewNeededDescription: Notify when QA requires your review

general.title: General
general.useClaudeMdDescription: Include CLAUDE.md instructions in agent context

linear.title: Linear
linear.integrationDescription: Connect to Linear for issue tracking and task import
linear.syncDescription: Sync with Linear for issue tracking

github.title: GitHub
github.integrationDescription: Connect to GitHub for issue tracking

defaultBranch.label: Default Branch

defaultBranch.selectedBranchHelp: All new tasks will branch from {{branch}}

gitlab.title: GitLab
gitlab.integrationDescription: Connect to GitLab for issue tracking

memory.title: Memory
memory.integrationDescription: Configure persistent cross-session memory for agents

agentProfile.label: Agent Profile
agentProfile.title: Default Agent Profile
agentProfile.sectionDescription: Select a preset configuration for model and thinking level
agentProfile.profilesInfo: Agent profiles provide preset configurations for Claude model and thinking level. When you create a new task, these settings will be used as defaults. You can always override them in the task creation wizard.
agentProfile.phaseConfigurationDescription: Customize model and thinking level for each phase
agentProfile.phaseConfigNote: These settings will be used as defaults when creating new tasks with this profile. You can override them per-task in the task creation wizard.

adaptiveThinking.tooltip: Opus uses adaptive thinking â€” it dynamically decides how much to think within the budget cap set by the thinking level.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Manage Claude accounts and API keys
integrations.claudeAccountsDescription: Add multiple Claude subscriptions to automatically switch between them when you hit rate limits.
integrations.claudeAccountsWarning: When authenticating, ensure you're logged into the correct Claude account in your browser. Each profile should use a different subscription.
integrations.runSetupToken: Run claude and type /login to authenticate
integrations.autoSwitchingDescription: Automatically switch between Claude accounts to avoid interruptions. Configure proactive monitoring to switch before hitting limits.
integrations.masterSwitch: Master switch for all auto-swap features
integrations.proactiveDescription: Check usage regularly and swap before hitting limits
integrations.sessionThresholdDescription: Switch when session usage reaches this level (recommended: 95%)
integrations.weeklyThresholdDescription: Switch when weekly usage reaches this level (recommended: 99%)
integrations.reactiveDescription: Auto-swap when unexpected rate limit is hit
integrations.autoSwitchOnAuthFailureDescription: Automatically switch to another authenticated account when authentication fails
integrations.apiKeysInfo: Keys set here are used as defaults. Individual projects can override these in their settings.

toast.authSuccessGeneric: Authentication complete. You can now use this profile.
toast.profileCreatedAuthFailedDescription: Profile was added but authentication could not start. Click the login button to authenticate.
toast.tokenSavedDescription: Your token has been saved successfully.
toast.terminalCreationFailedDescription: Unable to start the authentication process. {{error}}
toast.maxTerminalsReachedDescription: Please close some terminals and try again. You can have up to 12 terminals open.
toast.authProcessFailedDescription: The authentication terminal could not be created. Please try again or check the logs for more details.

alerts.profileCreatedAuthFailed: Profile created but failed to prepare authentication: {{error}}
alerts.authStartFailedMessage: Failed to start authentication. Please try again.

accounts.description: Manage Claude accounts and API endpoints

claudeCode.description: Add multiple Claude subscriptions to automatically switch between them when you hit rate limits.

empty.description: Configure custom Anthropic-compatible API endpoints to use alternative providers.

autoSwitching.title: Automatic Account Switching
autoSwitching.description: Automatically switch between accounts to avoid interruptions. Configure proactive monitoring to switch before hitting limits.
autoSwitching.masterSwitch: Master switch for all auto-swap features
autoSwitching.proactiveDescription: Check usage regularly and swap before hitting limits
autoSwitching.sessionThresholdDescription: Switch when session usage reaches this level (recommended: 95%)
autoSwitching.weeklyThresholdDescription: Switch when weekly usage reaches this level (recommended: 99%)
autoSwitching.reactiveDescription: Auto-swap when unexpected rate limit is hit
autoSwitching.autoSwitchOnAuthFailureDescription: Automatically switch to another authenticated account when authentication fails

priority.title: Account Priority Order
priority.description: Drag to reorder. System will switch to the next available account in order.
priority.noAccounts: No accounts configured. Add accounts above to set priority.
priority.duplicateUsageHint: This profile has identical usage to another profile, suggesting they may be authenticated to the same Anthropic account. Re-authenticate with a different account to fix.
priority.needsReauthHint: This profile's refresh token is invalid. Click to re-authenticate.
priority.tipDescription: Claude accounts are included in your subscription and will be cycled through first. API endpoints charge per request and are used as fallbacks when all Claude accounts hit their limits.

toast.tokenSavedDescription: Your token has been saved successfully.

alerts.profileCreatedAuthFailed: Profile created but failed to prepare authentication: {{error}}
alerts.authStartFailedMessage: Failed to start authentication. Please try again.

debug.title: Debug & Logs
debug.description: Access logs and debug information for troubleshooting

errorReporting.label: Anonymous Error Reporting
errorReporting.description: Send crash reports to help improve Auto Claude. No personal data or code is collected.

debug.helpText: When reporting bugs, click "Copy Debug Info" to get system information and recent errors that help us diagnose the issue.

noProjectSelected.title: No Project Selected
noProjectSelected.description: Select a project from the sidebar to configure its settings.

mcp.description: Configure which MCP servers are available for agents in this project

mcp.projectNotInitializedDescription: Initialize Auto Claude for this project to configure MCP servers.
mcp.addMcpDescription: Select an MCP server to add to this agent
mcp.allMcpsAdded: All available MCP servers are already added

electron.name: Electron
electron.description: Desktop app automation via Chrome DevTools

mcp.customServerDescription: Add a command-based or HTTP-based MCP server
mcp.noCustomServers: No custom servers configured. Add one to use with your agents.

mcp.errorCommandRequired: Command is required for command-based servers
mcp.errorUrlRequired: URL is required for HTTP-based servers
mcp.authTokenPlaceholder: Paste your API token or PAT here
mcp.authTokenHint: Used as Bearer token in the Authorization header

hints.github: This looks like a GitHub MCP server. You'll need a Personal Access Token with appropriate scopes.
hints.google: This looks like a Google API. You'll need an OAuth token or API key.
hints.anthropic: This looks like an Anthropic API. You'll need an API key.
hints.openai: This looks like an OpenAI API. You'll need an API key.

terminalFonts.title: Terminal Fonts
terminalFonts.description: Customize terminal font appearance and behavior

fontConfig.title: Font Configuration
fontConfig.description: Customize font family, size, weight, line height, and letter spacing
fontConfig.fontFamilyDescription: Primary monospace font for terminal text
fontConfig.fontWeightDescription: Font weight from 100 (thin) to 900 (black), in steps of 100
fontConfig.lineHeightDescription: Line height as a multiple of font size (1.0-2.0)

cursorConfig.title: Cursor Configuration
cursorConfig.description: Customize cursor style, blinking behavior, and accent color
cursorConfig.cursorStyleDescription: Choose the appearance of the terminal cursor
cursorConfig.cursorBlinkDescription: Enable or disable cursor blinking animation
cursorConfig.cursorAccentColorDescription: Choose the color of the terminal cursor

performanceConfig.title: Performance Settings

performanceConfig.scrollbackDescription: Maximum number of lines to keep in terminal history

presets.customDescription: Save your current configuration as a custom preset
presets.savePreset: Save current configuration as a preset
presets.noCustomPresets: No custom presets yet. Save your current configuration to get started.
presets.duplicateName: A preset with this name already exists

preview.title: Live Preview
preview.description: Preview your terminal settings in real-time (updates within 300ms)
preview.infoText: This preview updates within 300ms of any change to show how your settings will look in actual terminals.
